title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.12 - Monthly reconciliation of bank account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 16.12 - Monthly reconciliation of bank account

State Regulations

Each custodian of any account shall reconcile monthly the
cash balance in the cash account with the balance appearing on the bank
statement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
16.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
